dmca.title: Great Wall of Copyright (#2)
dmca.body:
Dec. 28th, 2002
    
                                                                     [Private]
                                        Xi'an International Studies University
                                                        Xi'an, Shannxi, 710061
                                                    People's Republic of China
    
Dear Google Editor,
    
Hereunder, I, on behalf of Travelchinaguide.com, the property of Xi'an 
Diamond Network Co, Ltd., would like to notify you a [sic] copyright infringement 
with part of our website content.

The copyrighted work at issue is the texts that appear on:

search result pages are listed below.
